LanguageData.ra2_Gun_Sniper.label: Allied Sniper Gun
LanguageData.ra2_Gun_Sniper.description: Can shoot the enemy from far away. The damage to mechanical organisms and tanks is relatively low, and the drawback is that they are very low in building damage.
